theDeriver:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theDeriver:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theDeriver:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theDeriver:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theDeriver:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theDeriver:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theDeriver:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theDeriver:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theDeriver:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theDeriver:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theDeriver:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theDeriver:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theDeriver:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
